original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū ukkuṭikāya antaraghare gacchanti …pe….
analyzed: ▁tena ▁kho ▁pana ▁samayena ▁chabbaggiyā ▁bhikkhū ▁ uk kuṭ ikāya ▁ antara ghar e ▁gacchanti ▁pe
▁na ▁ uk kuṭ ikāya ▁ antara ghar e ▁gam issāmīti ▁sikkhā ▁ karaṇīy āti

original: Yo anādariyaṁ paṭicca ukkuṭikāya antaraghare gacchati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
